20110104033010.000|20110104033012.000|TR0|two-square mile area.  It just doesn't 
20110104033012.000|20110104033014.000|TR0|sound feasible to me.
20110104033014.000|20110104033017.000|TR0|
20110104033017.000|20110104033019.000|TR0|LAVANDERA:  Beebe, Arkansas, has developed

20110104035035.000|20110104035037.000|TR0|
20110104035037.000|20110104035039.000|TR0|COOPER:  One of the most interesting 
20110104035039.000|20110104035041.000|TR0|details leading up to tomorrow's 
20110104035041.000|20110104035043.000|TR0|preliminary hearing is that a prosecutor 
20110104035043.000|20110104035045.000|TR0|says Dr. Murray's defense may be that 
20110104035045.000|20110104035048.000|TR0|Michael Jackson committed suicide.  Let's

20110104035100.000|20110104035102.000|TR0|Sanjay, is it possible for a person to 
20110104035102.000|20110104035105.000|TR0|self-administer Propofol?
20110104035105.000|20110104035107.000|TR0|
20110104035107.000|20110104035109.000|TR0|GUPTA:  Well, you know, a couple things.  
20110104035109.000|20110104035111.000|TR0|First of all, before this whole thing 
20110104035111.000|20110104035113.000|TR0|happened, Anderson, I had never even heard 
20110104035113.000|20110104035115.000|TR0|of Propofol ever being used outside a 
20110104035115.000|20110104035117.000|TR0|hospital, just to be clear on that.
20110104035117.000|20110104035120.000|TR0|
20110104035120.000|20110104035122.000|TR0|But despite the fact that he had been 
20110104035122.000|20110104035124.000|TR0|receiving lots of different sedatives for 
20110104035124.000|20110104035126.000|TR0|several hours before that, including 
20110104035126.000|20110104035128.000|TR0|Valium, Ativan, Versed, all medications 
20110104035128.000|20110104035130.000|TR0|that make you sleepy and, at least, 
20110104035130.000|20110104035132.000|TR0|according to that report, 25 milligrams of 
20110104035132.000|20110104035135.000|TR0|Propofol.  Given his tolerance to some of 
20110104035135.000|20110104035137.000|TR0|these medications over time, he 
20110104035137.000|20110104035139.000|TR0|potentially could, if he woke up from the 
20110104035139.000|20110104035141.000|TR0|medication or, you know, just was slightly 
20110104035141.000|20110104035143.000|TR0|sleepy, could potentially inject himself 
20110104035143.000|20110104035145.000|TR0|with more Propofol, if he had an IV in, 
20110104035145.000|20110104035147.000|TR0|for example.
20110104035147.000|20110104035149.000|TR0|
20110104035149.000|20110104035152.000|TR0|So it is possible, I guess, in the 
20110104035152.000|20110104035154.000|TR0|strictest sense of the word, but not very 
20110104035154.000|20110104035156.000|TR0|probable, given all those medications on 
20110104035156.000|20110104035158.000|TR0|board and just being very lethargic as a 
20110104035158.000|20110104035200.000|TR0|result of that.
20110104035200.000|20110104035202.000|TR0|

20110104035219.000|20110104035222.000|TR0|done that.

20110104035226.000|20110104035228.000|TR0|Michael Jackson 25 milligrams of Propofol. 
20110104035228.000|20110104035230.000|TR0| And many experts say that's not enough to 
20110104035230.000|20110104035232.000|TR0|put someone down.  It may make them a

20110104035306.000|20110104035309.000|TR0|mind, this was, you know, after an

20110104035313.000|20110104035315.000|TR0|Ativan, Valium and Versed.

20110104035321.000|20110104035324.000|TR0|medications, as Sunny was saying, and some 
20110104035324.000|20110104035326.000|TR0|had been taking that he'd been taking 
20110104035326.000|20110104035328.000|TR0|these medications over time and had 
20110104035328.000|20110104035330.000|TR0|questions of addiction.  Twenty-five 
20110104035330.000|20110104035332.000|TR0|milligrams of Propofol by itself probably 
20110104035332.000|20110104035334.000|TR0|wouldn't do a lot.  Make you kind of 
20110104035334.000|20110104035336.000|TR0|sleepy.
20110104035336.000|20110104035338.000|TR0|
20110104035338.000|20110104035341.000|TR0|The type of dose that we typically give in 
20110104035341.000|20110104035343.000|TR0|an operating room, for example, when 
20110104035343.000|20110104035345.000|TR0|someone is going off to sleep for general 
20110104035345.000|20110104035347.000|TR0|anesthesia, that's closer to a couple 
20110104035347.000|20110104035349.000|TR0|hundred milligrams of Propofol.  And 
20110104035349.000|20110104035351.000|TR0|immediately after that's done, you can see 
20110104035351.000|20110104035353.000|TR0|in this video here, it just takes about 10 
20110104035353.000|20110104035356.000|TR0|seconds for it to take effect.  And after 
20110104035356.000|20110104035358.000|TR0|that's done, the patient needs to have a 
20110104035358.000|20110104035400.000|TR0|breathing tube placed immediately, because 
20110104035400.000|20110104035402.000|TR0|Propofol makes you stop breathing.  That's 
20110104035402.000|20110104035404.000|TR0|how it could potentially kill somebody.
20110104035404.000|20110104035406.000|TR0|
20110104035406.000|20110104035408.000|TR0|The drug itself is not toxic.  In fact, it 
20110104035408.000|20110104035411.000|TR0|goes away very quickly in terms of being 
20110104035411.000|20110104035413.000|TR0|metabolized in the body.  But 25 
20110104035413.000|20110104035415.000|TR0|milligrams is a relatively small dose,
